tool_description: subscribe to youtube channels and get their episodes without google
name: Youtube Channels Api
title: Youtube Channels Api

api_list.name: feed#create
api_list.description:
creates feed in the api service by subscribing to youtube channel.
this endpoint returns youtube channel id, which is the needed parameter for feed#show which includes feeds's episodes.
param for this endpoint can be youtube channel id or youtube channel link.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-channels-api.p.rapidapi.com/feeds"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-channels-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-channels-api.p.rapidapi.com/feeds"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-channels-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
